        screenOrientation - valid only fullscreen=true.values should be one of ActivityInfo.SCREEN_ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT, ActivityInfo.SCREEN_ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE, ActivityInfo.SCREEN_ORIENTATION_SENSOR_PORTRAIT, ActivityInfo.SCREEN_ORIENTATION_REVERSE_LANDSCAPE
